Here you can find the papers I worked on. If you need further info or full texts, just reach out and I'll be happy to share more! You can find the most updated list of my publications on [my profile in google scholar](https://scholar.google.it/citations?user=g52GJngAAAAJ&hl=it&oi=ao).

## Published papers

-   Mancosu, M., Scaduto, G. "Crowds and Smiles: Visual Opportunity Structures and the Communication of European Political Leaders during the Covid-19 Pandemic". Mass Communication & Society. Forthcoming.

    -   My first paper, but on steroids.

-   [Bertero, A, Scaduto, G](https://oaj.fupress.net/index.php/qoe/article/view/14224). (2023). A midsummer night's dream: political communication during the Italian 2022 electoral campaign. Italian Journal of Electoral Studies QOE-IJES.

    -   A paper that deals with analyzing the 2022 electoral campaign in Italy from a political communication POV.

-   [Scaduto, G., & Mancosu, M. (2022).](https://www.rivisteweb.it/doi/10.3270/104851) Lacrime di coccodrillo? Variazioni nel contenuto visuale su Instagram dei politici populisti e mainstream durante la pandemia. *Comunicazione politica*, *23*(2), 255-276.

    -   The very first paper I ever worked on. Tries to investigate one simple question: do political leader smile less on Instagram while there are more deaths by Covid? And are there differences between populist and non-populist?

-   [Scaduto, G. (2022)](https://www.rivisteweb.it/doi/10.1424/104525). Gli algoritmi di computer vision: una guida all'uso per le scienze politiche e sociali. *Polis*, *36*(2), 315-332.

    -   Dealing with IA and machine learning before ChatGTP, Midjourneys and all those guys were cool.

## Working papers/Under review

-   Scaduto, G., Negri, F. Exploring the factors associated with political inferences from food preferences.

    -   Accepted for presentation at ECPR 2023 General Conference, AssoComPol 2023 Conference, SISP 2023 Conference. My first experimental paper dealing with why we think vegans are leftists and stuff like that.

-   Respi, C., Gui, M., Legnante, G., Pizzul, D., Gerosa, T., Scaduto, G. & Serini, M. Privacy protection as an exception in the digital inequality framework (and why this is not good news)

    -   Presented at VDATA Final Conference in Pavia (IT), 7-8 September 2023. I am working ion the results section of this paper. It is my first experience with doing structural equation modeling. I don't think it will be the last :)
